Title: Financial Planning & Analysis Analyst (H/F)
localisation: Immeuble LA COMANAV, 7 Boulevard la résistance
Company: C’est en 1902 que le Dr Willis H. Carrier invente et fabrique le tout premier climatiseur moderne au monde. Depuis cette date, Carrier Corporation est le numéro un mondial de la climatisation, avec plus de 4 millions d’unités...
Job Description: We're looking for a Financial Planning Analyst (H/F) for our partner Carrier who is a leading provider of heating, ventilating, air conditioning and refrigeration systems, building controls and automation, and fire and security systems leading to safer,...
compétences:
Looking for a candidate with excellent analytical, financial accounting skills, problem-solving capabilities, and ability to multi-task and prioritize within a dynamic environment. You are expected to supply process improvements. Ideally you will be a strong communicator with project management skills, be organized, and highly-energetic in a dynamic and evolving professional environment. You should be hands-on in leading the analytical, reporting and other areas of responsibilities.
Qualification:
Bac+5 in Finance ;5 years of of progressive industry and Finance/ FP&A experience ;Strong communication skills both written and oral ;Strong work ethic ;Methodical approach with ability to identify / correct errors in data ;Proficiency in Microsoft Office products with advanced Excel and power point skills ;Systems oriented: SAP / HFM / advanced Excel functions ;Result oriented: design/improve and implement new processes, programs and systems; focus on execution.
What we can offer :
Work-life balance ;Satrt-up spirit in a fast growing international environment ;Continuous learning environment ;Attractive package ;Team-building and more activities...etc.
Do not hesitate. Apply now !!
